Class InputHandler

      • getInt

        public static int getInt(java.lang.String prompt)
        Get an integer from the command line.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A string to display
        Returns:
        The value that the user entered

      • getInt

        public static int getInt(java.lang.String prompt,
         int from,
         int to)
        Get an integer from the command line. If the value is not between from and to, the user will be warned and prompted again.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A String to display
        from - The lowest acceptable input
        to - The highest acceptable input
        Returns:
        The integer that the user entered

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String prompt)
        Get a sting from the command line
        Parameters:
        prompt - A string to display
        Returns:
        The value that the user entered

      • getYesOrNo

        public static boolean getYesOrNo(java.lang.String prompt)
        Get the answer to a yes or no question as a Boolean.
        Parameters:
        prompt - A string to display
        Returns:
        The value that the user entered as a Boolean
